class_b_01_math_01:
Olá pessoal.  Prazer em conhecê-la.  Meu nome
é Tyme e serei seu professor de matemática.[npcn:25]
class_b_01_math_02:
Desculpe em coloca-los nessa saia justa,
mas deixe-me fazer uma pergunta rápida—\r
 Vocês gostam de números, aritmética e afins?[npcn:25]
class_b_01_math_03:
Oh meu Deus.  Hahaha.  Obrigado por suas
respostas honestas.[npcn:25]
class_b_01_math_04:
Alguns de vocês podem gostar de números e
outros não.  Acho uma ótima mistura.[npcn:25]
class_b_01_math_05:
Não importa sua opinião sobre matemática,
espero é que gostem de nossas aulas!\c
Farei o possível para encontrar uma maneira
de combinar seu interesse com matemática![npcn:25]
class_b_01_math_06: Falando nisso, estão em dia com estudos de confrontos de tipos Pokémon?[npcn:25]
class_b_01_math_07:
Por exemplo, a grama é forte contra a água e a
água é forte contra o fogo, correto?[npcn:25]
class_b_01_math_08:
[BD06:0][trnm:0], você parece
ser\r
bom\r
com\r
Pokémon,\r
então\r
deixe\r
me\r
perguntar\r
isto a você.[npcn:25]
class_b_01_math_09:
Bearing in mind that Water is strong against Fire...
If the move Water Gun hits a Fire-type Pokémon,\r
what becomes of the move’s damage?[npcn:25]
class_b_01_math_answer_01:
Oh, my. A little reverse thinking, I see! But I’d
probably be in rough shape afterward if I got hit\r
by something I was weak to. Wouldn’t you be?[npcn:25]
class_b_01_math_answer_02:
A real hardy individual, I see! But I’d probably
be in rough shape afterward if I got hit by\r
something I was weak to. Wouldn’t you be?[npcn:25]
class_b_01_math_answer_03:
That’s right! I knew I could count on you for this
question, [trnm:0].[npcn:25]
class_b_01_math_10:
Using moves of a type that your opponent is
weak to is a supereffective tactic!\c
It multiplies the damage of those moves by two![npcn:25]
class_b_01_math_11:
On the other hand, using moves of a type that
your opponent is resistant to isn’t very effective.\r
It divides the damage of your moves by two.[npcn:25]
class_b_01_math_12:
Haha! I don’t mean to encroach on Ms. Dendra’s
battle studies territory, of course, but I thought\r
it best to use a lively topic as an example.[npcn:25]
class_b_01_math_13:
That can make math fun even for those of you
who don’t much like the subject, don’t you think?[npcn:25]
class_b_01_math_14:
Oh, my. Is that the bell? I suppose that’s all for
now. What a shame...[npcn:25]
class_b_01_math_15:
I’m looking forward to seeing you all in the next
class. I hope you’re looking forward to it, too![npcn:25]
